name: Melancholy (Maniacbob)
description:
Overwhelmed with melancholy over having lost touch with friends of days gone, you've come to a social network site filled with your friends. Will you reconnect with any of them?

Game design, programming, and art assets by: Daniel Atkinson

All music created by Stefan Grossman
Intro - Salvation
Game - Undying Love
Outro - Joy
Find more of his wonderful music on his bandcamp page:
https://stefangrossmann.bandcamp.com/

Font used:
Squarewave created by Jeti
Find this and more of their work at:
https://www.dafont.com/jeti.d1589
